summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TheSyncBridge - 325-day mission platform. All backend APIs and frontend features working correctly.
passed_tests: Mission status API returns Day 0/325 correctly
Guardian registration generates unique Scroll IDs (SB-0001, SB-0002, etc.)
Duplicate email registration returns existing guardian data
Certificate page displays correct Scroll ID and registration date
Guardian Registry shows all registered guardians with proper display
Transmissions page shows placeholder content correctly
Scroll ID lookup works with existing email addresses
Navigation between all pages (Home, Register, Lookup, Certificate, Transmissions, Registry) works
Mission Clock displays Day 0/325 on landing page
Guardian count API increments correctly after registration
All API endpoints respond with correct status codes
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (9/9 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (12/12 features tested successfully)
